@name Mario EGP
@inputs A:wirelink

if(first() | dupefinished()) {
    #printColor(1, vec(100,100,100), "Made by Pepsi Dealer Licensed under Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International. To wire just get out the advanced wiring tool then click on A:wirelink from the E2 and wire it to an EGP emitter")
    setName("Mario EGP
    Author: Pepsi Dealer
    Version: v 1.5.0")
    
    setName("Mario EGP
    Price: Free at bybservers.co.uk
    
    Written by Pepsi Dealer")
    
    #[
        print(_HUD_PRINTCONSOLE,
        "Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International
        http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
    
    
        You are free:
        to Share: to copy, distribute and transmit the work
        to Remix: to adapt the work")
        print(_HUD_PRINTCONSOLE,
        "Under the following conditions:
        Attribution: You must attribute the work in the manner specified 
        by the author or licensor (but not in any way that suggests that they endorse you or your use of the work).")
        print(_HUD_PRINTCONSOLE,
        "Noncommercial: You may not use this work for commercial purposes.
        Share-Alike: If you alter, transform, or build upon this work, you may 
        distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar license to this one.")
    ]#

    A:egpClear()
    
    A:egpBox(1, vec2(250,450), vec2(100,10))
    A:egpColor(1,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(2, vec2(305,440), vec2(10,10))
    A:egpColor(2,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(3, vec2(195,440), vec2(10,10))
    A:egpColor(3,0,0,0,255)

    A:egpColor(4,0,0,0,255)

    A:egpColor(5,0,0,0,255)

    A:egpColor(6,0,0,0,255)

    A:egpColor(7,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(8, vec2(175,400), vec2(30,10))
    A:egpColor(8,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(9, vec2(325,400), vec2(30,10))
    A:egpColor(9,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(10, vec2(250,390), vec2(120,10))
    A:egpColor(10,0,0,0,255)
    
    A:egpBox(13, vec2(250,427), vec2(100,36))
    A:egpColor(13,255,255,255,255)
    
    A:egpBox(14, vec2(310,415), vec2(20,20))
    A:egpColor(14,255,255,255,255)
    
    A:egpBox(15, vec2(190,415), vec2(20,20))
    A:egpColor(15,255,255,255,255)
    
    A:egpBox(16, vec2(195,430), vec2(10,10))
    A:egpColor(16,255,255,255,255)
    
    A:egpBox(17, vec2(305,430), vec2(10,10))
    A:egpColor(17,255,255,255,255)
